code: import'./App.css';import HeadShot1 from'./_images/BenSmith_PQ_2_Radio.jpg';import HeadShot2 from'./_images/BenSmith_PQ_1.jpg';/*  S E L E C T  P H O T O  R A N D O M L Y  */import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var headshots=[HeadShot1,HeadShot2];var headshot=headshots[Math.floor(Math.random()*headshots.length)];/*  R E N D E R  E L E M E N T  */function AboutMe(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-fluid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"mt-3 page-heading-2 display-5",children:"About Me"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row gy-3 mt-2 align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-lg-3 d-none d-lg-block",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:headshot,className:"img-fluid rounded shadow",alt:"Ben Smith"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-lg-9",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{className:"page-subheading text-start",children:["Ben Smith",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("small",{className:"text-muted",children:" (He/him)"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["I am a freelance theatre sound engineer based in SE London, working as a ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"sound operator"})," for musicals and plays: I have worked on Regional productions, National and International Tours, and in the West End. I am confident ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"mixing musicals"}),", including working with actor-musicians, click-tracks, and in large venues, as well as looking after backstage as a ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Sound No. 2"}),"."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["I also have experience in ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"sound design"})," for theatrical productions, concerts and live events."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Recently, I have spent this period of lockdown refining my collection of ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"https://www.github.com/bsmith96/Qlab-Scripts",target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",className:"text-reset",children:"scripts for Figure 53's Qlab"}),", as well as creating a few simple scripts to make working with ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"https://www.github.com/bsmith96/Reaper-Scripts",target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",className:"text-reset",children:"Reaper"})," easier in a live theatre environment, and a small application which allows you to remotely display the position of the playhead on a ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"https://www.github.com/bsmith96/qlab-display",target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",className:"text-reset",children:"remote Qlab cue list"}),". I also learnt some simple web development for one-page sites, such as the one you're looking at right now!"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["While live theatre remains a struggle for many creatives and venues, I am also available for work on ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"recordings"})," and broadcast events, whether it\u2019s ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"editing"})," and cleaning up recordings from zoom, ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"mixing"})," a performance remotely or as a livestream, or a creative ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"sound design"})," for a digital production."]})]})]})]});}export default AboutMe;
